title: New install -launching prompts for password
author: johnm65
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I downloaded mRemoteNG, tried to launch it but I am prompted for a password in a dialog box. Is there a default password?

When I click "Cancel" on the Password dialog box the error below comes up.

comments.snippet: Seems you on first run accept to encode and encrypt and its set a password, so on next run its ask for such master password to get access to connection data. If you don't remember or don't know just delete connection.xml and restart app.
comments.author: Kvarkas
